Supply Chain Management.1: Understand the technical content and theory of supply chain management systems.
Supply Chain Management.2: Develop the ability to quantitatively model typical supply chain problems.
Supply Chain Management.3: Understand principles of acquisition, transportation, and delivery of supply chain content.
Supply Chain Management.4: Learn computer systems available to support management and coordination of supply chains.
Supply Chain Management.5: Develop the ability to effectively communicate within organizations.
Supply Chain Management.6: Understand value systems, ethics, and sustainability.
